item.description:
Join us as we gradually work our way through the restaurants of the North End in 2011! We will be starting off with Lucia Ristorante & Bar on Hanover Street. After dinner, we will probably head nearby for dessert or drinks. Don't miss out on a fun evening of good company and delicious Italian food.

Each member pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

RSVP note: Meet Up has removed the 'maybe' option from the RSVP list. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, be sure to change your RSVP as soon as possible.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Join us for a North End Dinner & Drinks Series: Lucia Ristorante
